member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.RemoteView
member.summary: Represents the proxy class for the widget application.

member.name: F:Tizen.Applications.RemoteView.Event.FeedMouseUp
member.summary: Type for feeding the mouse-up event to the widget application.

member.name: F:Tizen.Applications.RemoteView.Event.CancelClick
member.summary: Type for canceling the click event procedure.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.RemoteView.Layout
member.summary: Layout object including preview image, overlay text, loading text, and remote screen image.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.RemoteView.Content
member.remarks: This string can be used for creating contents of the widget again after rebooting a device or it can be recovered from a crash (abnormal status).

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.RemoteView.Title
member.summary: Summarized string of the widget content for accessibility.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.RemoteView.PauseAll
member.summary: Pauses all the connected widget applications.
member.exception: Thrown when this operation failed.
Thrown when this operation is denied.
Thrown when this operation is not supported for this device.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.RemoteView.ResumeAll
member.summary: Resumes all the connected widget applications.
member.exception: Thrown when this operation failed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.RemoteView.Pause
member.summary: Pauses the widget application which is connected on this proxy.
